config_meta.author: Justin May
config_meta.desc: This is a reference template configuration file for use with femto.py v1.1

config.name: replace with system identifier
config.genpv_base: forms the initial pv base string
config.dev_base: in case this is different from base
config.matlab_pv_base: again, change this if different; commonly dev_base + 'matlab'
config.counter_base: replace with pv string base for time interval counter
config.freq_counter: replace with pv string base for frequency counter
config.phase_motor: replace with pv string base for phase controller
config.error_pv_name: pv name to report error status
config.version_pv_name: pv name for version of code
config.laser_trigger: pv string for the laser trigger
